casebody.data:
In re JACOBS.
appealed by Kermedis Jacobs. No. 122P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2006. Kermedis Jacobs, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Petitioner (Kermadis Jacobs) on the 14th day of March 2006 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Robeson County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th day of March 2006.
